author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1596402109}
review:
RacetronicVR is a free Hover car driving, laser shooting, VR racing fun with a space freighter load of obstacles, shortcuts, power ups and secrets.  It worked on my new system, looked ok, played ok, sounded ok.  The graphics are low rez basic shapes and blocky.  The UI was ok. 

CONS: - the locomotion mode causes wild swinging movements.

 Warning: This game will cause motion sickness in some players.  I was trying the tutorial and within a minute of using the locomotion i was feeling sick.

Try it, if you have a strong stomach, Otherwise don't bother downloading.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049056172', 'num_games_owned': 1191, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1510603225}
review:
Avoid like the plague unless you want to throw up.
Whoever thought that steering with your left hand was a good idea was wrong.
The problema is that the movement is absolute, once you begin to accelerate the car spins towards the direction of your hand, which makes everything uncontrolable.
And I felt very bad in a very short time, I usaukky have good dizyness resistance, but I could not bear this game.

I know is free so you can give it a try if you want, but be warned you are going to feel very ill.
